channel.title: Debian on RECALL's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Debian on RECALL's Blog

item.title: debian 安装指定版本的 docker
item.description: 1. 加入软件源 cat >> /etc/apt/sources.list <<-EOF deb [arch=amd64] https://apt.dockerproject.org/repo debian-jessie main EOF 不能连接 https 时 apt install apt-transport-https 2. 更新 metadata apt update 3. 列出可选版本 apt-cache policy docker-engine docker-engine: Installed: 1.13.1-0~debian-jessie Candidate: 1.13.1-0~debian-jessie Version table: *** 1.13.1-0~debian-jessie 0 500 https://apt.dockerproject.org/repo/ debian-jessie/main amd64 Packages 100 /var/lib/dpkg/status 1.13.0-0~debian-jessie 0 500 https://apt.dockerproject.org/repo/ debian-jessie/main amd64 Packages 1.12.6-0~debian-jessie 0 500 https://apt.dockerproject.org/repo/ debian-jessie/main amd64 Packages 1.12.5-0~debian-jessie 0 500 https://apt.dockerproject.org/repo/ debian-jessie/main amd64 Packages 1.
